Search, Graphing and Speed üö§ | Airbrake NG15

Hello Airbraker,

Today I'm very happy to introduce Airbrake NG15; a new interface that we've had in the works for a while. We've taken all of your feedback and we can't wait for you to start using this latest iteration of our UI.


Read more below or log in and check it out for yourself.


Thank you,
The Exceptional team.




Search

You can now search through all of you exceptions. Quickly pinpoint the error you are looking for with this feature.





Filtering

You can now filter by Deploy, Host, Environment and then apply a range of sorts to enable you to find important information previously hidden from within your exceptions.





Keyboard Navigation

Unlike Cats, we know you hate mice, and want to quickly resolve your exceptions. Today, we've launched our first ever comprehensive Keyboard Navigation.





Speed

We put a lot of work into making this version of Airbrake lighting fast. Navigate through similar errors and our error list at a 5X speed.




Try it for yourself.
